messages.content: My name is Tad. I am promoting a workshop where my team and I will be sharing cutting-edge approaches demonstrating live how to leverage A.I. for the automation of social media marketing. I have a Pinecone knowledge base holding some of my past high-performing posts across various social media platforms. I'd like you generate a search term that I can use to retrieve the most similar past posts based in my objective so I can thereafter generate new marketing copy in the style of my posts. Respond in JSON like so: { "search_term": string }
